function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Barriers restricting movement of labor and population due to long-term relief measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unintended inefficiencies in the housing sector due to long-term relief measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Housing insecurity leading to mental health issues such as chronic mental disorders, depression, psychological distress, anxiety, and suicide.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in demand for larger homes and outdoor spaces may lead to overcrowding and reduced physical distancing, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in demand for affordable housing may lead to displacement and overcrowding in lower-income communities, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on housing prices","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regional differences in housing preferences","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in home size and extra bedrooms in densely populated areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate attention to social aspects in residential building assessment tools","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of focus on pandemic resistance indicators in sustainability rating tools","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient coverage of waste and wastewater management in assessment tools","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Gaps in pandemic resilience in global assessment tools breeam, casbee, leed, well","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate integration of sustainability and pandemic resilience goals in residential building design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rapid spreading of infectious diseases in pre-pandemic homes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residents’ mental, psychological, and physical health problems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing costs of adopting epidemic-resilient changes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Epidemics posing a future risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in lifestyle affecting use of homes","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortcomings of cities in pandemic response","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 has changed the perception of home space and created new preferences in the real estate market.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The pandemic has highlighted the shortcomings of cities and provided an opportunity for sustainability-oriented design.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and airflow in residential spaces leading to increased risk of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate spatial design leading to overcrowding and close contact among residents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient separation of different zones within homes leading to cross-contamination among different areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor air quality contributing to increased number of deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 in the air and on surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient treatment of outside air in hvac systems may lead to the escape of microscopic particles, including covid-19 viruses, into treated air, posing a risk of infection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study of air conditioners and their relationship to the global pandemic may uncover risks related to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air pollution contributing to the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to indoor pollutants as a result of poor ventilation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 can be transmitted by inhaling the virus from more than one and a half meters.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of particles from infected individuals throughout a room or indoor location.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosols remaining in the air after a person leaves a room, potentially remaining airborne for hours.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambient aerosol pollution reduction","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of hvac systems on the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Doubts and lack of information leading to uncertainty about the contribution of hvac systems to the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the transmission of infection through air circulation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistency in virus survival due to environmental factors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of sars-cov-2 in air conditioning systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heat stress in non-air-conditioned places","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Controversy regarding air as a vector for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 through the air due to airborne transmission of particles less than 5 µm in size","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of air pollution on viral infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control measures during evacuation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 due to aerosol droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of protective measures face masks, social distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased frequency of covid-19 infection in cold and dry conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 in outdoor air between neighboring apartments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fan-assisted natural ventilation increasing the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term exposure to low viral concentration in high-density residential neighborhoods","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
